3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Good dimensional transformation, clear interior volume, and proper 3D wall corner geometry. The viewing angle is good. The cutaway effectively reveals the interior. Not perfect score due to some slightly distorted perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The room configuration is largely accurate with correct adjacencies and preserved proportions for major rooms. Wall positions are mostly aligned, and lengths are proportional. Minor issue with the utility room being combined with service room in 3D. Most doors are present and on correct walls, but some windows are missing or not accurately placed, especially the large windows in the living area and balconies. Balconies are also simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present in appropriate rooms, including beds, sofas, tables, kitchen, and bathroom fixtures. The scale is generally reasonable, and orientation is logical. Some furniture is stylized and simplified, and not every piece from the 2D plan is replicated.

visual_clarity.notes: Structural elements are clearly distinguishable, and the geometry is readable. Lighting is good, ensuring the interior is well visible without obscuring details. The aesthetic coherence is high with consistent material usage and no major rendering artifacts. The background is clean.

detected_errors.description: Some windows in the living area and balconies in the 2D plan are not accurately represented or sized in the 3D model. Balconies are simplified geometric shapes without the pattern shown in 2D.
The utility room and service room from the 2D plan appear to be somewhat combined or simplified in the 3D rendition, losing some distinct separation.

summary: The 3D transformation is geometrically faithful with good preservation of layout and room configurations, despite minor discrepancies in window placement and simplification of some minor rooms and balconies.
